lessons.japanese: スミス夫妻は似合いの夫婦だ。
lessons.english: Mr. and Mrs. Smith are a good match.

lessons.japanese: スミス夫妻は、夜にはあまり外出しないタイプの夫婦です。
lessons.english: Mr. and Mrs. Smith are the sort of couple who don't go out much in the evenings.

lessons.japanese: スミス夫妻のテレビにはいいかげんうんざりです。
lessons.english: He's just about had enough of the Smiths' TV.

lessons.japanese: ウィリアムズ夫妻は、両親が死んだ子供を養子にした。
lessons.english: Mr. and Mrs. Williams adopted a child whose parents were dead.

lessons.japanese: 夫妻は家を売りに出した。
lessons.english: The couple put their house on the market.

lessons.japanese: 夫妻は化学を近代科学へと一変させた。
lessons.english: The couple transformed chemistry into a modern science.

lessons.japanese: 池田夫妻は健の先生に話しかけました。
lessons.english: Mr. and Mrs. Ikeda talked to Ken's teacher.
